blogPost.excerpt: A place for your links and notes Keep all of your links and notes in one place, and easily share them with your Clubhouse community. Free your links from limitations of text Save time and effort by shortening links to the right length with one click.
blogPost.body: A place for your links and notes Keep all of your links and notes in one place, and easily share them with your Clubhouse community. Free your links from limitations of text Save time and effort by shortening links to the right length with one click.
blogPost.title: shorten.club - URL shortener to voice for Clubhouse 👋
blogPost.author: Ömer Gülen

localize.description: 链接和笔记的存放处 将所有的链接和笔记存放在一个地方，并轻松地与你的会所社区分享。让您的链接不受文字限制 一键将链接缩短到合适的长度，节省时间和精力。
鏈接和筆記的存放處 將所有的鏈接和筆記存放在一個地方，並輕鬆地與你的會所社區分享。讓您的鏈接不受文字限制 一鍵將鏈接縮短到合適的長度，節省時間和精力。

previous.excerpt: Life Curator, is an super intuitive and easy to manage Notion template aims to help all people our there to streamline their lives. You will get already related Tasks-Projects databases along with 10+ resources pages Get $3 off with "producthunt21"
previous.title: Life Curator - Notion all-in-one life & project management Notion template

localize.description: 生活馆，是一个超级直观和易于管理的Notion模板，旨在帮助所有的人，我们有简化他们的生活。你将得到已经相关的任务-项目数据库以及10多个资源页面 获得3美元的优惠，用 "producthunt21"。
localize.tagline: Notion一体化生活和项目管理 Notion模板

localize.description: 生活館，是一個超級直觀和易於管理的Notion模板，旨在幫助所有的人，我們有簡化他們的生活。你將得到已經相關的任務-項目數據庫以及10多個資源頁面 獲得3美元的優惠，用 "producthunt21"。
localize.tagline: Notion一體化生活和項目管理 Notion模板

next.excerpt: Watch Something helps you find great movies or TV shows to watch on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime. But instead of recommending 1000 mediocre options, Watch Something provides 3 great, highly rated options (you can load more), based on the user preferred genre.
next.title: Watch Something - Discover what to watch on Netflix, Amazon and Hulu

localize.description: Watch Something 帮助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上观看的优秀电影或电视节目。但是，Watch Something不是推荐1000个平庸的选项，而是根据用户喜欢的类型，提供3个伟大的、高评价的选项（你可以加载更多）。
localize.tagline: 发现在Netflix、亚马逊和Hulu上看什么？

localize.description: Watch Something 幫助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上觀看的優秀電影或電視節目。但是，Watch Something不是推薦1000個平庸的選項，而是根據用戶喜歡的類型，提供3個偉大的、高評價的選項（你可以加載更多）。
localize.tagline: 發現在Netflix、亞馬遜和Hulu上看什麼？
